text: Silver Swan is a condiment brand owned by NutriAsia. It was first introduced as a soy sauce brand in 1942 by Sy Bun Suan. Later on, the brand was expanded to include vinegar, fish sauce, chili sauce and oyster sauce. The name Silver Swan was derived from a phonetic similarity with the founder’s name Sy Bun Suan with production facilities in Malabon and Cebu in 1942. ==References== * * * * Category:NutriAsia brands Category:Philippine brands Category:Products introduced in 1942
title: Silver Swan (brand)
